issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.summary: HiveHBaseTableOutputFormat can't call getFileExtension(JobConf jc, boolean isCompressed, HiveOutputFormat<?, ?> hiveOutputFormat)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: ClassCastException occurs when executing sql statement "insert into" on hbase table

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
This issue was caused by same reason described in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11166. As the original Jira seems to be abandoned, so create this one to resolve the issue.

HiveHBaseTableOutputFormat does not implemented HiveOutputFormat, it will break the compatibility in spark's API when it is using hive.
fields.summary: HiveHBaseTableOutputFormat should implement HiveOutputFormat to ensure compatibility

Thanks [~ychena] very much for reviewing the patch.
Because HiveOutputFormat is an interface extends interface OutputFormat. As HiveHBaseTableOutputFormat is going to implement HiveOutputFormat, so we will have to implements methods for both interfaces, which are getHiveRecordWriter() and getRecordWriter(). Let me know if you have any other feedback to help to improve the patch :) Thanks!

https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12942514/HIVE-20678.2.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12942514 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Submit patch 3 to remove getRecordWriter() implementation for OutputFormat interface and it will throw NotImplementedException when the method is used. As the HiveHBaseTableOutputFormat should be an object of HiveOutputFormat instead of OutputFormat's. Tested it on a cluster with spark shell didn't notice any exception or error after the change.

Submitted patch 5 which is identical to patch 2 and just improved javadoc style for TestHiveHBaseTableOutputFormat.java.
